name: GroupSession.State
desc: The possible states of a session.

items.name: case waiting
items.desc: An idle state that indicates the session is waiting for the app to join the activity.

items.name: case joined
items.desc: An active state that indicates the session allows data synchronization between devices.

items.name: case invalidated(reason: Error)
items.desc: A state that indicates the session is no longer valid and canâ€™t be used for shared activities.

items.name: static func == (GroupSession<ActivityType>.State, GroupSession<ActivityType>.State) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.
